name: Paint Hit (itch)
description:
Enjoy the beautiful art style and casual gameplay. You won't stop till you splat all the way to the top! 

- 350's of levels 

- Great audio to help you get in the zone

Experience the amazing paint hit game to make the colorful color tower hit. Enjoy this addictive game and get addicted to it. Download this amazing one touch game. Get lost into the world of painting and make an amazing tower of different colors. The PaintHit game will definitely drive you crazy and make you addicted to the paint fun that you will not forget. Hit the tower now and paint the color tower. Level of difficulty increases with each successive level. Make the beautiful tower of the colors with smashing the paint balls on to the tower.

• One tap easy to learn controls, rich visual effects and addictive gameplay mechanics. 

• There are multiple attractive colors effects 

• Beautiful Graphics 

• Addictive gameplay
